gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 124, Bulls 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Bulls, 124-104.  Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the way with 31 points (12-18 FG), five rebounds and 10 assists for the Thunder, while Josh Giddey added 16 points, six rebounds and six assists in the victory.  DeMar DeRozan tallied 20 points and five rebounds for the Bulls in the losing effort.  The Thunder improve to 1-0 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 0-1.
